summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 TOYOTA HIGHLANDER HYBRID. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ABS FAILED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ROBBINS TOYOTA OF TEXARKANA (6233 MALL DR, NASH, TX 75569 (903) 794-5121) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE ACCUMULATOR PART FAILED AND THE ACCUMULATOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 146,000. *LN    THE CONSUMER STATED AN INDEPENDENT DIAGNOSTIC TEST FOUND THE ACTUATOR TO BE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. *JS    5 WARNING LIGHTS ARE ILLUMINATED ON MY VEHICLE.  1) MASTER  WARNING LIGHT  2) BRAKE SYSTEM WARNING LIGHT IN RED  3) BRAKE SYSTEM WARNING IN YELLOW  4) ABS WARNING LIGHT  5) LIGHT ABOVE ABS IN YELLOW, I CAN BE CONTACTED AT 903-280-0111  UPDATED 9/12/18*JB
